func.title: SetActionData
func.desc: Sets the extra data for the current action. The application of the extra data depends on the procedure of the current action. See ActMap procedures.

example.text: Script for a special clonk: with key Special 2 he will build a vertical gold bridge.
Adjusts the attaching vertex of the windmill wheel so that the wheel's third vertex will attach to the second vertex of the windmill scaffolding.
